diff_analysis.evidence: In the OLD code of Backend\Modules\Pages\Ajax\UploadFile, the writeFile method only allowed a fixed list of image extensions (ALLOWED_EXTENSIONS) and threw an exception otherwise. The NEW code removes this whitelist and the extension check entirely, allowing arbitrary file types to be uploaded to a web-accessible directory, which is an Unrestricted Upload of File with Dangerous Type (CWE-434).
